allow:
Bash(python3 -c "
import base64
import zlib

# Minimal PDF with XFA that contains XXE-like XML
# This PDF contains XFA (XML Forms Architecture) data with external entity references
pdf_content = b''''''%PDF-1.4
1 0 obj
<<
/Type /Catalog
/AcroForm 2 0 R
/Pages 3 0 R
>>
endobj

2 0 obj
<<
/XFA [
  (preamble) 4 0 R
  (template) 5 0 R
]
>>
endobj

3 0 obj
<<
/Type /Pages
/Kids [6 0 R]
/Count 1
>>
endobj

4 0 obj
<<
/Length 100
>>
stream
<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""UTF-8""?>
<xdp:xdp xmlns:xdp=""http://ns.adobe.com/xdp/"">
endstream
endobj

5 0 obj
<<
/Length 350
>>
stream
<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""UTF-8""?>
<!DOCTYPE template [
  <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM ""file:///etc/passwd"">
]>
<template xmlns=""http://www.xfa.org/schema/xfa-template/3.3/"">
  <subform name=""form1"">
    <field name=""testField"">
      <value>
        <text>&xxe;</text>
      </value>
    </field>
  </subform>
</template>
endstream
endobj

6 0 obj
<<
/Type /Page
/Parent 3 0 R
/MediaBox [0 0 612 792]
/Contents 7 0 R
/Resources <<
  /Font <<
    /F1 <<
      /Type /Font
      /Subtype /Type1
      /BaseFont /Helvetica
    >>
  >>
>>
>>
endobj

7 0 obj
<<
/Length 44
>>
stream
BT
/F1 12 Tf
100 700 Td
(Test PDF) Tj
ET
endstream
endobj

xref
0 8
0000000000 65535 f 
0000000009 00000 n 
0000000087 00000 n 
0000000149 00000 n 
0000000206 00000 n 
0000000357 00000 n 
0000000762 00000 n 
0000000951 00000 n 
trailer
<<
/Size 8
/Root 1 0 R
>>
startxref
1044
%%EOF
''''''

# Write the PDF
with open(''/Users/janhoy/git/solr2/solr/modules/extraction/src/test-files/extraction/pdf-with-xfa-xxe.pdf'', ''wb'') as f:
    f.write(pdf_content)
    
print(''PDF with XFA created successfully'')
")
